job description:
Under the
direction of the Data Management Group, the Senior Analyst is accountable to
support the AML Enterprise in all aspects of the data quality and data issues
life cycle, from identification through root cause and remediation. monitoring
data quality defects throughout AML. This individual will represent the
business in understanding and explaining business impacts. This
individual will work across multiple applications and will utilize JIRA to
document and track the defects.

Key Dimensions
of Capability

·

Providing
fair and balanced insights into current, emerging and potential technology or
data related issues, trends and opportunities.

·

Serves as a liaison between the business
programs community and the IT organization to provide technical solutions to
meet user needs.

·

Assists in the business process redesign and
documentation as needed for new technology.

·

Conducts efficient requirement gathering session
with multiple stakeholders to capture business requirement.

·

Requirements development execution, including
the elicitation, analysis, specification and validation.

·

Participate in the requirements management
processes, including change control, version control, tracking and status
reporting, and traceability.

·

Proactively identifying risks, issues, and
action items leading to possible solutions.

·

Interacting with internal and external
organizations.

·

Support business rules, requirements, and
models.
  • Sustained work experience in presenting and managing decision material
    and content to Senior Management
  • Excellent computer skills and proficient in Excel, Word, PowerPoint
    and Outlook
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, both verbal and
    written
  • Excels at operating in a fast-paced technical environment
  • Ability to solve problems, identify solutions, and appropriately
    escalate issues
  • Experience using JIRA, Sharepoint
  • Strong SQL experience
  • Knowledge of formal business process documentation.
  • Understanding of AML and compliance Business
